attributes.action: The Royal British Legion are not selling poppies in certain areas on Nov 11 this year. This is because some minorities say that it will upset them.
attributes.additional_details: The Royal British Legion are not selling poppies in certain areas on Nov 11 this year. This is because some minorities say that it will upset them. I say sod off ... The poppy is a symbol of reverence for our fallen heroes of all the wars the BRITISH military have fought in. BRITAIN STAND UP AND SAY 'WE WANT THE POPPY SOLD EVERY WERE IN THE UK'. THIS IS OUR RIGHT TO REMEMBER OUR FALLEN..
